template.title: Flexible Check-in After 2:00 PM
template.description: Check-in time is after 2:00 PM. Early check-in may be available upon request.

template.title: Check-out Before 11:00 AM
template.description: Check-out time is before 11:00 AM. Late checkout may be arranged in advance.

template.title: No Parties or Large Gatherings
template.description: Parties, events, and large gatherings are not permitted to respect neighbors.

template.title: Report Any Damages Immediately
template.description: Please report any damages or maintenance issues to the host as soon as they occur.

template.title: Quiet Hours 10 PM - 8 AM
template.description: Please respect neighbors and keep noise to a minimum between 10 PM and 8 AM.

template.title: One Parking Space Included
template.description: One designated parking space is included. Additional vehicles must park on street.

template.title: Service Animals Welcome
template.description: Service animals are always welcome. Please notify host in advance.

template.title: Pets Welcome
template.description: Well-behaved pets are welcome! Please clean up after your pet and keep them supervised.
